metadata.title: CVE-2023-52888 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Compliant (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:media: mediatek: vcodec: Only free buffer VA that is not NULLIn the MediaTek vcodec driver, while mtk_vcodec_mem_free() is mostlycalled only when the buffer to free exists, there are some instancesthat didn't do the check and triggered warnings in practice.We believe those checks were forgotten unintentionally. Add the checksback to fix the warnings.

criterions.comment: linux-fips package in fips-updates/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
linux-aws-fips package in fips-updates/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
linux-azure-fips package in fips-updates/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
linux-gcp-fips package in fips-updates/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
